item.title: Tidy Binomial Calculator Using the probs Package
item.description: Install Simulated Data This short post introduces a simple R package called probs that I created for tidy binomial probability calculations. Install The probs package lives on GitHub. library(devtools) devtools::install_github("dannymorris/probs") Simulated Data Recently, I needed to communicate to a larger audience the probability of detecting a particular event. Specifically, a pre-existing process was in place that required humans to sift through a sample of 100 PDF documents out of 40,000 documents.
